posts.post_content:
Posted By: Mark
FOR SALE

Turkey Red Mordecai Brown.  Absolutely beautiful card, probably would have graded a 5, except that somebody apparently tried to recolor a bit of the top border.  This card has great corners, and is absolutely clean with tremendous color, and no creases or wrinkles.  Graded PSA A.  $375 delivered.

Turkey Red Mike Mitchell.  Very nice, would have graded 3 or 4, however, someone has recolored the tips of the four corners.  They did an extremely nice job - you don't notice it unless you are specifically looking for it.  Graded PSA A.  $175 delivered.

Front and back scans of both cards available.

Posted By: Brian Collie
Any other HOFs for sale - looking for 1.5 to 3.  Let me know.

Thanks,

Brian

Posted By: Ted
Have a Jake Stahl in PSa 1 f/s/t very nice sen 2 pinholes, last VVCP sale  was 320 would trade for another T3 I need of equal value
